gguidance 0.0.0.9000

    Axes
  • Changelog

    Function reference

    Axis guides

    Extensions of axis guides to tweak the display of position scales.

    guide_axis_cap()
    Axis guide with capped axis line
    guide_axis_extend()
    Extended axis guide
    guide_axis_minor()
    Axis guide with ticks for minor breaks
    guide_axis_nested()
    Nested axis guide
    guide_axis_table()
    Table as axis guide

    Colourbar guides

    Alternatives to guide_colourbar() to display continuous colour and fill scales.

    guide_colour_histogram()
    Histogram colour guide
    guide_colour_violin()
    Violin colour guide
    guide_colourbar_cap() guide_colorbar_cap()
    Capped colour bar guide

    Legend guides

    Variations on a guide_legend() to display discrete representations of data.

    guide_legend_cross()
    Cross table legend guide
    guide_legend_string()
    String legend

    Grid guides

    Additional ways of laying out the panel grid.

    coord_guided()
    Cartesian coordinates with grid guides.
    guide_grid()
    Vanilla grid guide
    guide_grid_plus()
    'Plus' grid guide
    guide_grid_zebra()
    Zebra grid

    Miscellaneous

    Functions that aren’t directly guide functions

    bracket_sigmoid() bracket_atan() bracket_curvy() bracket_line() bracket_round() bracket_chevron() bracket_square()
    Bracket options
    breaks_between()
    Breaks between discrete categories
    elements_text()
    List of theme elements
    CoordGuided gguidance_extensions GuideAxisExtend GuideAxisNested GuideAxisTable GuideColourHistogram GuideColourViolin GuideColourbarCap GuideGrid GuideGridPlus GuideGridZebra GuideLegendCross GuideLegendString
    ggproto objects in gguidance
